title: M'speak amulet

properties.name: description
properties.value: A m'speak amulet is an amulet used to communicate with monkeys. It is made during the Monkey Madness I quest to speak with the citizens of Ape Atoll. It is later used in the Freeing King Awowogei subquest of Recipe for Disaster as well as Monkey Madness II. After the completion of Monkey Madness II, the amulet is no longer needed to speak with monkeys.

content:
This article is about amulet to communicate with monkeys. For the language monkeys speak, see monkey language.
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Monkeyspeak amulet
M'speak amulet

Item ID4021

A m'speak amulet is an amulet used to communicate with monkeys. It is made during the Monkey Madness I quest to speak with the citizens of Ape Atoll. It is later used in the Freeing King Awowogei subquest of Recipe for Disaster as well as Monkey Madness II. After the completion of Monkey Madness II, the amulet is no longer needed to speak with monkeys.

To make one, the player must take Monkey dentures, an M'amulet mould and a Gold bar to Zooknock, who will give the player an Enchanted bar (and the mould back). The bar must then be used on one of the fires underneath the Temple of Marimbo with the M'amulet mould in the player's inventory. This will create the unstrung M'speak amulet, which must be used on a Ball of wool before it can be worn.

If the M'speak amulet is lost, it cannot be reobtained by any means other than repeating the above steps, or it can be reclaimed from Zooknock after completing Monkey Madness II.

Since Zooknock returns the M'amulet mould to the player when the bar is created, only one M'amulet mould is required to create 2 or more Enchanted bars.

[[File:M'speak amulet detail.png|left|130px]]
A '''m'speak amulet''' is an amulet used to communicate with [[monkey]]s. It is made during the [[Monkey Madness I]] quest to speak with the citizens of [[Ape Atoll]]. It is later used in the [[Recipe for Disaster#Awowogei|Freeing King Awowogei subquest]] of [[Recipe for Disaster]] as well as [[Monkey Madness II]]. After the completion of [[Monkey Madness II]], the amulet is no longer needed to speak with monkeys.

To make one, the player must take [[Monkey dentures]], an [[M'amulet mould]] and a [[Gold bar]] to [[Zooknock]], who will give the player an [[Enchanted bar]] (and the mould back). The bar must then be used on one of the fires underneath the [[Temple of Marimbo]] with the M'amulet mould in the player's inventory. This will create the unstrung M'speak amulet, which must be used on a [[Ball of wool]] before it can be worn.

If the M'speak amulet is lost, it cannot be reobtained by any means other than repeating the above steps, or it can be reclaimed from Zooknock after completing [[Monkey Madness II]].

Since Zooknock returns the M'amulet mould to the player when the bar is created, only one M'amulet mould is required to create 2 or more Enchanted bars.
